title: Movie-Recommender-System
description: The Movie Recommendation System is a content-based recommendation system  to provide personalized movie suggestions.

title: ChatNow
description: ChatNow is the frontend of a chatting website that enables users to communicate in real-time and provides features like chatting,blcking or viewing users.

title: Hilink-Travel App
description: HiLink-Travel App is the frontend of a website designed to assist campers in finding the nearest and safest locations to enhance their camping experience.
